About Me

Something about me

BIO

I am a Full Stack Developer with organised, simplistic and yet effective problem-solving skills. After graduating with a Master's in Computer Science & Computer Applications, I started a career in Information Technology. I worked for about 10 years in the industry, before I quit my job to take care of my newborn son and family. After a break of 7 years, I started to pursue my passion in web development. I joined the Rutger's Coding Bootcamp to reinvent myself and to learn the new technologies.

Verizon Wireless

Lead Developer

Price Plan Analysis(PPA) is a data mining tool that gets the data of every customer like usage data, device information, type of plan (share/ non share), price of the plan and cost. Involved in understanding the existing process of how the tool worked, then suggested a better way of processing, changing the existing code and rewriting the code so the process worked efficiently and effectively. Developed extensive DB operation with Oracle as DB with query optimization

PNC Global Investment Servicing

Full Stack Developer
